data.name: Karan Guglani
data.journey: I got selected in Microbird in first year and have worked dedicatedly for the club. The whole journey from being a member in 1st year to Secretary in 4th year has taught me a lot! Microbird really played important role in my personal and professional growth. I will always be grateful for that. Glad that I got a chace to work with such a nice bunch of seniors, juniors and batchmates!

data.name: Daksh Bakshi
data.journey:
If there's something that leaves an everlasting imprint down the memory lane of my college life, it definitely would be the moments I have spent with Microbird.
It is at Microbird, that I have learnt both technical and life skills that are going to help me all along my life.
The picture perfect moments like the pre-fest preps, working together in the quarters and the success parties are the one's I am going to cherish forever.
data.position: Product Engineer at Cadence Design Systems

data.name: Madhur Maheshwari
data.journey: Microbird was the best part of my college life. From being a member in first year and learning from seniors to the Secretary in final year and leading the club activities, I enjoyed every phase. It gave me some unforgettable memories that I will cherish my whole life. It gave me the best people be it seniors, collegues or juniors. I can put anything on stake to get those MB days back.
data.position: Product Validation Engineer @ Cadence Design Systems

data.name: Gaurav yadav
data.journey:
It was the only life man !!
From 1st year to 4th year, it was like another family to me.
I really miss my days with my microbuddies. 
we made friends for life in microbird.
we got very tallented seniours and excillent juniours.
whaterver i'm today is just because i got good friend circle because of microbird.
while writing this i got bit in to nostalgia

data.name: Kushaldeep
data.journey: The journey with Microbird society has been great. I learnt at technical and personal levels. I got best of people and best advices from the seniors which has really helped me in shaping my career.

data.name: Vaibhav
data.journey: It was a really fun experience working with a bunch of tallented people.Microbird is a place where I have learned a lot(from my juniors, seniors and batch mates) not only technical things but  other skills also which help me a lot after finishing my graduation. It was overall a fun experience where we worked together and do fun together.

data.name: Riya Mangla
data.journey: I joined Microbird in second year and got a chance to work with bunch of people. I worked with full dedication and learned a lot while working here and enjoyed also. Microbird played an important role in my personal and professional growth.
